comment._content: The other photos in the series are wonderful too - catalogue.nli.ie/Record/vtls000047607 Will we (social networkers) manage to find the name of the little fellow - he would be in his fifties now. It's a great big pity we have to grow up.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/79549245@N06] That's a hoot! I hadn't realised that Google would have been in around any parks.
